metadata.script_title: Agentic AI to Autonomously Resolve 80% of Customer Service by 2029

visual_prompts.context: Six months ago, I was skeptical about agentic_ai.

runway.prompt: Sleek digital dashboard: Before/after split screen. Modern UI, glowing elements, dark theme, cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field

kling.prompt: Realistic tech environment: Before/after split screen. Modern office setting, actual screens displaying data, natural lighting, professional workspace

real_footage.notes: Shows actual working system, builds trust
